title: Short task title (deliverable)

deliverables.title: Concrete deliverable (file-level)

evidence: Optional: `npm test` / `npm run guardrails` / a CLI command demonstrating output.

deliverables.title: Docs/contract updated for the deliverable

subtasks.title: Concrete subtask
